items.title: You're Perfect | Perfecting Powder
items.description:
You're Perfect is a soft light beige tint.

The Kylie Cosmetics perfecting powder is a lightly tinted, silky powder that will leave your skin looking soft and radiant. Apply all over face or any area where you desire a subtle, radiant finish. Each perfecting powder single comes with one pressed powder that can be used to recreate Kylie’s favorite looks or customize your own.

|||

items.title: Kybrow Extreme Hold Gel | Brow Gel
items.description:
Add natural bulk and definition to your brows with this brush-on gel that has extreme hold and setting power.

1x Kybrow Extreme Brow Gel (.22 fl. oz./6.5 ml)

|||

Formula Attributes
✓Lightweight
✓Non-sticky
✓Smooth application
✓Water resistant
✓Helps tame unruly brows and holds your desired brow shape in place

Application Tips
Apply the Kybrow Extreme Hold Gel to help tame brows and hold your desired brow shape all day long!

items.title: Brow Brush | Kybrow
items.description: The Kylie Cosmetics dual ended Brow Brush is perfect to define your arch and brow line with the angled side. Create a full dramatic brow with the spoolie end. Try it with our Brow Powder!

items.title: 2014 | Matte Lip Kit
items.description:
The Kylie Cosmetics 2014 Matte Liquid Lipstick Lip Kit is your secret weapon to create the perfect 'Kylie Lip.' Each Lip Kit comes with a Matte Liquid Lipstick and matching Lip Liner.

2014 is a deep teal blue.

Each Lip Kit contains: 

  • 1 Matte Liquid Lipstick (0.11 oz./ 3.25 g)
  • 1 Pencil Lip Liner (net wt./ poids net  .03 oz/ 1.0g)
|||
    Lip Liner
    This ultra-long wearing Lip Liner has a creamy texture that glides across the lips for a very easy and comfortable application. The Lip Liner sharpens easily in most standard sized sharpeners - just make sure your sharpener is not dull!

    Matte Liquid Lipstick
    The Matte Liquid Lipstick has high intensity pigment for an instant bold matte lip. The extremely long wearing lipstick contains moisturizing ingredients for a comfortable, emollient and silky feel that does not dry out your lips.

This ultra-long wearing lip liner has a creamy texture that glides across the lips for a very easy and comfortable application. The Lip Liner sharpens easily in most standard sized sharpeners - just make sure your sharpener is not dull! 22 can be worn alone or layered with your favorite #KylieCosmetics Matte Liquid Lipstick or Gloss.

items.title: 3 Step Mini Set
items.description:
Available on KylieSkin.com GET FREE DOMESTIC SHIPPING for all orders over $30

All your Kylie Skin skincare essentials for travel.

3 Step Mini Set Includes:
Mini Foaming Face Wash
Mini Face Moisturizer
Mini Vanilla Milk Toner


      |||

      FOAMING FACE WASH

      Size

      1 fl oz / 30 ml

      Ingredients

      Water/Aqua/Eau, Potassium Cocoyl Glycinate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Potassium Cocoate, Glycerin, Hydroxyacetophenone, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Citric Acid, Polyquaternium-39, Fragrance (Parfum), Sodium Benzoate, Actinidia Chinensis (Kiwi) Seed Oil, Sodium Hyaluronate, Phenoxyethanol

      1 fl oz / 30 ml

      Ingredients

      Water/Aqua/Eau, Glycerin, Squalane, Dicaprylyl Ether, Neopentyl Glycol Diethylhexanoate, Phenoxyethanol, Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Kernel Oil, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Sorbitan Stearate, PPG-26-Buteth-26, Polyglyceryl-3 Laurate, Glyceryl Stearate, PEG-100 Stearate, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Chlorphenesin, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Musa Paradisiaca (Banana) Leaf Extract, Sucrose Cocoate, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Fragrance (Parfum), Chondrus Crispus Extract, Disodium EDTA, Aminomethyl Propanol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Hydroxyacetophenone, Linalool, Benzyl Salicylate, Hedychium Coronarium Root Extract, Tocopherol, Actinidia Chinensis (Kiwi) Seed Oil

      FACE MOISTURIZER

      Size

      0.5 fl oz / 15 ml

      Ingredients

      Water/Aqua/Eau, Isopropyl Palmitate, Propanediol, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Jojoba Esters, Glycerin, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Dimethicone, Sorbitan Stearate, Stearic Acid, Glyceryl Stearate, PEG-100 Stearate, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Phenoxyethanol, Cetyl Alcohol, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Polysorbate 40, Chlorphenesin, Avena Sativa (Oat) Bran Extract, Carbomer, Musa Paradisiaca (Banana) Leaf Extract, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Fructose, Ethylhexylglycerin, Aminomethyl Propanol, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Extract, Polysorbate 60, Sorbitan Isostearate, Withania Somnifera Root Extract, Backhousia Citriodora Leaf Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Tocopherol, Potassium Sorbate, Citric Acid, Actinidia Chinensis (Kiwi) Seed Oil

items.title: Almond | Skin Concealer
items.description:
Almond is a rich hazelnut ​with yellow undertones ​for deep skin tones.

DETAILS:

The Kylie Cosmetics Skin Concealer is a lightweight formula that provides medium buildable coverage for a skin-like finish. The long-wearing concealer, available in an all-inclusive range of 30 shades, gives a luminous finish that looks just like your skin, and is ideal for all skin types. The buildable formula allows you to achieve your desired level of coverage. Wear alone for a natural, dewy look or pair with your favorite setting powder for a matte finish. Perfect for spot concealing, lightening dark circles under the eyes and hiding imperfections. The paddle flock applicator makes application easy.

Formula Attributes:

• Creamy, lightweight formula blends seamlessly for instantly perfected skin
• Buildable coverage with a luminous satin skin-like finish
• Perfect for spot concealing, hiding imperfections, and brightening dark circles under the eyes
• Long wearing formula is water and sweat resistant

Key Ingredients:

• Infused with Alpha Hydroxy Acids (AHAs) that gently smooth the appearance of the skin's surface
• Keeps skin looking hydrated for easy application and extended wear
• Ultra fine powders blur the appearance of pores and wrinkles, and camouflage uneven skin tone

Contains:

  • 1 Skin Concealer (0.22 oz./ 6.3g)

items.title: Almost Friday | Matte Lipstick
items.description:
Almost Friday is a pale brick pink.

1 Matte Lipstick (0.12 oz./ 3.5 g)


Matte Lipstick
The Kylie Cosmetics Matte Lipstick is a smooth and creamy formula that provides full coverage for an ultra-pigmented lip. The hydrating matte lipstick glides onto the lips for a comfortable matte finish.

|||
How to
Wear alone or pair with your favorite gloss for a high shine finish.

items.title: Always True | Eyeshadow Single
items.description:
The Kylie Cosmetics eyeshadow singles are highly-blendable, pigmented pressed powder shadows in a creamy texture, available in multiple finishes. Each shadow comes individually packaged, allowing you to remove the pan and insert into your Kylie Professional Palette with ease, to create your own customized palette filled with your favorite matte and metallic shades.

Always True is a metallic rose gold with silver pearl

|||

Contains:

  • 1 Kyshadow pressed powder single (net weight / pods net 1 X 1.40 grams / 1 X 0.05 oz)  

Mix and match your Kylie Cosmetics pressed powder singles to recreate Kylie’s favorite looks or customize your own.

All of our pressed powder singles are paraben free and have medium buildable coverage and a velvety smooth texture.

 

BORON NITRIDE, ALUMINUM STARCH OCTENYLSUCCINATE, DIMETHICONE,
PHENOXYETHANOL, LAUROYL LYSINE, CAPRYLYL GLYCOL, ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN, HEXYLENE GLYCOL, IRON OXIDES (CI 77491, CI 77492), MICA (CI 77019), TITANIUM DIOXIDE (CI 77891)
